alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Harding County; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 2:14PM MST until January 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, South Central Mountains, Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Curry County, Roosevelt County, De Baca County, Eastern Lincoln County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If holiday decorations are still displayed outside, gusty winds on Wednesday could damage or blow these decorations away.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Harding County; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
